title: Equivalence-Based Instruction (EBI) Project Design and Implementation for Higher Education Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Systematic acquisition of complex social science concepts through self-directed mastery in a smartphone-centered environment

learning_goals: Learners can construct derivative relational networks between social science concepts with over 80% accuracy by applying EBI principles
Learners can design three types of EBI training scenarios and conduct implementation evaluations through project-based learning
Learners can verify EBI application results at a 90% confidence level through peer feedback and self-assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
